nb2medium[source]

nb2medium(title, notebook)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
first_article = nb2medium(title = 'First test', notebook = '../tests/test-notebook.ipynb')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
first_article.json()
